title: Modern Luxury Villa
description: Stunning modern villa with panoramic city views, infinity pool, and smart home technology. Features include a gourmet kitchen, wine cellar, home theater, and landscaped gardens.

title: Penthouse Downtown
description: Spectacular penthouse with 360-degree views of the city skyline. Floor-to-ceiling windows, designer finishes, and access to premium building amenities including concierge and rooftop lounge.

title: Beachfront Estate
description: Exclusive beachfront estate with private beach access. Features include multiple living spaces, chef's kitchen, spa, and breathtaking ocean views from every room.

title: Contemporary Loft
description: Stylish contemporary loft in a converted warehouse. Open-concept design with exposed brick, high ceilings, and modern appliances. Walking distance to trendy restaurants and galleries.

title: Mountain View Chalet
description: Luxury mountain chalet with stunning alpine views. Features include a stone fireplace, hot tub, ski room, and proximity to world-class ski resorts.

title: Historic Townhouse
description: Beautifully restored historic townhouse with original architectural details. Modern amenities blend seamlessly with period features including crown molding and hardwood throughout.
